about_the_game:
Welcome to BYTEWORLD!

A fully interactive, Twitch integrated environment designed for streamers and viewers alike!

Host your streams with fun interactions, engaging minigames and a bundle of crazy ways to have fun with your chat!

Or, as a viewer, participate with your streamer and provide that real-time, one on one experience that delayed Twitch chats just can't simulate!

Features:

  • Connect to Twitch for full livestream integration, responding to channel point rewards, messages and even raids!

  • Allow viewers to join you and interact with you over a multiplayer network

  • Play minigames with viewers, like a drawing game where you use a pen items to draw a prompt, and the first viewer to guess the prompt in chat, wins!

  • Full access to the Twitch API library, for monitoring Twitch stats, viewer attendance and any other fun stats!

Note: This is a demo, so the number of features available is limited, whereas the full game will contain all the items, minigames, integrations, etc.

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content is very cartoonish and playful, such as the avatar's head exploding, but shouldn't ever cross into the realm of disturbing or uncomfortable

detailed_description:
Welcome to BYTEWORLD!

A fully interactive, Twitch integrated environment designed for streamers and viewers alike!

Host your streams with fun interactions, engaging minigames and a bundle of crazy ways to have fun with your chat!

Or, as a viewer, participate with your streamer and provide that real-time, one on one experience that delayed Twitch chats just can't simulate!

Features:

  • Connect to Twitch for full livestream integration, responding to channel point rewards, messages and even raids!

  • Allow viewers to join you and interact with you over a multiplayer network

  • Play minigames with viewers, like a drawing game where you use a pen items to draw a prompt, and the first viewer to guess the prompt in chat, wins!

  • Full access to the Twitch API library, for monitoring Twitch stats, viewer attendance and any other fun stats!

Note: This is a demo, so the number of features available is limited, whereas the full game will contain all the items, minigames, integrations, etc.
ext_user_account_notice: You must have a Twitch account to host or join a game
name: BYTEWORLD Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to BYTEWORLD, a fully interactive, Twitch integrated experience for both streamers and viewers!
